text: the sons of Hattil. Agia, the sons of Pochereth-haz-zebaim, Ezra ii. 57. Phacareth, the sons of Sabie, the sons of Sarothie, the sons of Another reading is, Misaias. Masias, the sons of Gas, the sons of Addus, the sons of Subas, the sons of Apherra, the sons of Barodis, the sons of Saphat, the sons of Allon.
